timeline.message: Add tests for distinct set collector

Fix typo

Probably happened during refactoring.

Fix param name

It's not necessarily right (or left, or someting else), but just a set.

Fix assertion

It's a (hash) set, so no order guarantee.

timeline.bodyText: Do you think we should really verify that it's a HashSet - any other implementation should be fine as well, right?
timeline.author: nipafx

replies.bodyText: Yes, another implementation would do the job too. I just thought it would make sense to specify the current implementation as part of the tests. Feel free to delete the test case.
replies.author: beatngu13

timeline.message: Remove test that verifies use of `HashSet`
